citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15 PM on
11DEC2024.
The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by calling the cell number and emailing.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
